document_data.mainbody:
Siela was a female elf who resided in the Malars Throat district of Port Nyanzaru, Chult in the late 15 century DR.
During the events of the death curse in the late 15 century DR, Siela was one of several citizens of Malars Throat to be captured by a group of pterafolk who attacked the district. She realized that she was to be sacrificed to the jungle, and was placed as an offering in a cluster of thorny brambles alongside a tabaxi named Ashen Rock. Despite her frantic calls for help, she was dragged screaming into the brambles and killed by twig and needle blights.
